lines: scotch® r100 mounting tape cards on cabinet

holds up to 1 lb each strip holds up to 0.75 lb

use instead of push pins to keep your surfaces looking great

not recommended for use on wallpaper, delicate surfaces or walls painted with flat paint
ideal for use on most flat surfaces including stainless steel, acrylic, glass and finished wood
